rooms.description: Spacious foyer with natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows, aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy entry.
Bohemian styled living area combining eclectic furnishings and vibrant colors, featuring large floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring abundant natural light.
Open kitchen design with adjoining dining space; incorporates Indian aesthetics with modern touches and ensures ventilation aligning to Vastu norms.
Small but functional bathroom with proper ventilation and water drainage designed as per local building standards.
